about_page.title: About our platform
about_page.intro: Welcome to our personalized game creation platform designed for educators, therapists, and families of autistic children. This platform is part of a broader vision â€” to provide caregivers with adapted tools to create sensory and educational games tailored to each child's unique needs.
about_page.supported_languages: With support for Arabic, French, and English, our tools allow you to create new memory or multiple-choice games or enhance existing ones by adding new levels and screens.
about_page.vision: We are a group of four passionate software engineering students, driven by a desire to make a real impact. With the valuable guidance of our mentor Madame Lilia SFAXI and the expertise of child therapist Mr. Mehdi CHIHA, we were able to bring this vision to life.
about_page.thanks: A big thank you to them for their trust, patience, and constant encouragement.

add_game.label: Create a new memory game
add_game.description: Start by entering the name, description, instruction, category, and number of pairs. Then confirm the pairs to automatically create the game, the first level (Level 1), the first screen (Screen 1), and its options.

add_level.label: Add a level to an existing memory game
add_level.description: Choose an existing game, enter the instruction, and add the image pairs. A new level will be automatically created with a screen (Screen 1) and its options.

add_screen.label: Add a screen to an existing memory game
add_screen.description: Choose an existing game, enter the instruction and image pairs. A new screen will be automatically added to the most recent level of this game with its options.

landing_page.title: Welcome to Arc-en-jeu
landing_page.subtitle: Designed for teachers, therapists, and passionate educators who believe in the power of personalized play.
landing_page.description: Arc-en-jeu allows you to create sensory educational games adapted to autistic children. With our mobile app and intuitive web platform, you can design personalized memory games and quizzes with specific instructions, flexible options, and full support in French, English, and Arabic. You can also enhance existing games by adding new levels or screens for a unique, inclusive, and playful learning experience.
